name: Web Blox Project
summary: A WB file is a development project created by Web Blox, a modified version of MIT Scratch 1.4. It contains a webpage created using the Scratch programming language. WB files can be opened only in Web Blox, and not in the default version of Scratch.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: WB file open in Web Blox
images.alt: WB file open in Web Blox
